text: {character} particularly likes Rocheval Rouge, a fine local wine which we happen to have a case of.
subject: NON_SYMPATHISER_CHARACTER

text: Word is the Germans are planning a harsh crackdown on the old Rocheval traditions. People will resent this and remember what it means to be free.
subject: NONE

text: They say there’s going to be a mandatory census soon. Everyone will have to come out, like it or not.
subject: NONE

text: I’ve heard the British are preparing a major drop. More supplies, more hope—if we can hold on.
subject: NONE

text: Someone claims to have seen {character} alive, sneaking around near the old safehouse. There’s still hope.
subject: MIA_CHARACTER

text: There’s talk of a hidden dossier with details that could change everything, if we’re brave enough to grab it.
subject: NONE

text: The latest? Power cuts all over the district. Searches won’t be as effective in the dark, that's for sure.
subject: NONE

text: Something major has gone down in Brussels. They say forces are being pulled from everywhere to deal with it.
subject: NONE

text: There’s talk that {poi} is a prime spot for a resistance hideout. We should investigate.
subject: ANY_POI

text: Our contacts have said {poi} is crawling with enemy patrols. Proceed with caution.
subject: ANY_POI

text: They say we have one chance to make this work, and we must act now or lose the opportunity entirely.
subject: NONE

text: Rumor has it the window is short and we’ll only have one day once we begin. We should be ready soon.
subject: NONE

text: Whispers suggest we’ll need to act fast when we do move, but we’ve got a few days to prepare.
subject: NONE

text: There’s urgency in the air; the mission will be over in a day, but we can wait a while before committing.
subject: NONE

text: We’ll need two days to pull this off, and the opportunity won’t wait—it’s now or never.
subject: NONE

text: Time is short; the mission will last two days, and we’ve got a slim window before the chance is gone.
subject: NONE

text: We’ve heard the mission will take two days, but there’s still time to strategize before it’s too late.
subject: NONE

text: Insiders say we’ll need two days to see this through, though we can wait a bit before beginning.
subject: NONE

text: The task will stretch over three days, but we must act now or miss out on this vital opportunity.
subject: NONE

text: The mission will be a three-day endeavor, and the window to act is closing faster than we’d like.
subject: NONE

text: It’ll take three days to complete, but we have a reasonable window to decide when to start.
subject: NONE

text: There’s talk of a three-day mission on the horizon. We have a bit of time to prepare, but not forever.
subject: NONE

text: This mission is a four-day commitment, but the chance to act will pass us by if we don’t jump on it immediately.
subject: NONE

text: We’ll need four days to finish this, and there isn’t much time to make up our minds before it’s too late.
subject: NONE

text: A four-day effort lies ahead, but we’ve got some time before we’re forced to act.
subject: NONE

text: It’ll take four days from start to finish, but for now, we can choose when to set things in motion.
subject: NONE
